message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.CV, cs.RO

This paper is primarily focused on reinforcement learning (RL) and its application to a specific game, Space Fortress. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), which encompasses RL. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of deep learning algorithms, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the challenges of reward sparsity and context-dependent reversals of strategy, which are topics in game theory (cs.GT). The game Space Fortress also involves visual input, which could fall under computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses the use of transfer learning, which could fall under robotics (cs.RO) as it involves the transfer of knowledge from one task to another.
